Address.label: Address
Address.value: 4707 EXECUTIVE DRIVE, SAN DIEGO, California, 92121, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: LPL Financial Holdings is an independent broker/dealer that provides a platform of proprietary technology, brokerage, and investment advisory services to financial advisors and institutions. As of the end of 2021, the company had nearly 20,000 advisors on its platform managing over $1 trillion of client assets.
